header.xliffext:poisonError: Handback file name: lo-mt_queries.c9bed6e64b6af55a5b40ed02c26dda86bd3c4885.ja-jp is different with handoff file name: queries.c9bed6e64b6af55a5b40ed02c26dda86bd3c4885.ja-jp.

trans-unit.target: クエリ (Visual Basic) |Microsoft ドキュメント
クエリ (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] enables you to create [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/vbteclinqext_md.md)] expressions in your code.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]作成することができます[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/vbteclinqext_md.md)]コード内の式。
このセクションの内容
[Aggregate 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/aggregate-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Aggregate` clause, which applies one or more aggregate functions to a collection.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Aggregate`句は、1 つまたは複数の集計関数をコレクションに適用します。
[Distinct 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/distinct-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Distinct` clause, which restricts the values of the current range variable to eliminate duplicate values in query results.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Distinct`句は、クエリ結果内で重複する値を排除する現在の範囲変数の値を制限します。
[From 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/from-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `From` clause, which specifies a collection and a range variable for a query.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`From`句は、コレクションとクエリの範囲変数を指定します。
[Group By 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-by-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Group By` clause, which groups the elements of a query result and can be used to apply aggregate functions to each group.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Group By`句では、クエリ結果の要素をグループ化され、各グループに集計関数を適用するために使用できます。
[Group Join 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/group-join-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Group Join` clause, which combines two collections into a single hierarchical collection.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Group Join`句は、2 つのコレクションを&1; つの階層コレクションに結合します。
[Join 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/join-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Join` clause, which combines two collections into a single collection.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Join`句は、2 つのコレクションを&1; つのコレクションに結合します。
[Let 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/let-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Let` clause, which computes a value and assigns it to a new variable in the query.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Let`句では、値を計算し、クエリ内の新しい変数に割り当てます。
[Order By 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/order-by-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Order By` clause, which specifies the sort order for columns in a query.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Order By`句は、クエリ内の列の並べ替え順序を指定します。
[Select 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/select-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Select` clause, which declares a set of range variables for a query.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Select`句は、クエリの範囲変数のセットを宣言します。
[Skip 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/skip-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Skip` clause, which bypasses a specified number of elements in a collection and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Skip`句では、指定したコレクション内の要素数をバイパスし、残りの要素を返します。
[Skip While 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/skip-while-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Skip While` clause, which bypasses elements in a collection as long as a specified condition is `true` and then returns the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Skip While`句は、指定された条件がである限り、コレクション内の要素をバイパス`true`し、残りの要素を返します。
[Take 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/take-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Take` clause, which returns a specified number of contiguous elements from the start of a collection.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Take`句は、コレクションの先頭から指定した数の連続する要素を返します。
[Take While 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/take-while-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Take While` clause, which includes elements in a collection as long as a specified condition is `true` and bypasses the remaining elements.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Take While`句は、指定された条件が限り、コレクション内の要素を含む`true`し、残りの要素をバイパスします。
[WHERE 句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/where-clause.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the `Where` clause, which specifies a filtering condition for a query.
trans-unit.target: 説明、`Where`句は、クエリのフィルター条件を指定します。
関連項目
[LINQ](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/index.md)
[Visual Basic における LINQ の概要](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/introduction-to-linq.md)
